SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN
OID = #oid#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo#

#sortBy# ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN
OID = #oid#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo#
BATCH_SEQ = #batchSeq#
HANDLER1CODE = #handler1code#
TEMP_1 = #temp1#
IS_NEW = #isNew#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS OID FROM DUAL
insert into FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN (OID, BATCH_NO, BATCH_SEQ, IS_NEW, PRINTVIRTUALCODE, POLICYNO, ORDERSEQ, RATIONCODE, OLDPOLICYNO, HANDLERIDENTIFYNUMBER, HANDLER1CODE, COMCODE, AGENTCODE, EXTRACOMCODE, EXTRACOMNAME, BUSINESSNATURE, CHANNELTYPE, PROJECTCODE, INTRODUCERID, STARTDATE, MAILDATE, UPDATEDATE, SERIALNO_1, MORTGAGEEPCODE_1, SEQUENCENO_1, CREDITNUMBER_1, COLLATERALNUMBER_1, LOANSBEHALFNUMBER_1, LOANACCOUNT_1, LOANSDEPARTMENT_1, SERIALNO_2, MORTGAGEEPCODE_2, SEQUENCENO_2, CREDITNUMBER_2, COLLATERALNUMBER_2, LOANSBEHALFNUMBER_2, LOANACCOUNT_2, LOANSDEPARTMENT_2, ADDRESSNO, ADDRESSCODE, ADDRESSNAME, ADDRESSDETAILINFO, REPEATPOLICYNO, POSSESSNATURECODE, BUILDINGNO, PROP_ADDRESSNO, WALLMATERIAL, ROOFMATERIAL, STRUCTURE, STRUCTURE_TEXT, SUMFLOORS, BUILDAREA, BUILDYEARS, KINDCODE_F, KINDNAME_F, ITEMCODE_F, ITEMNAME_F, ITEMNATURE_F, BUILDINGNO_F, HIGHRISEFEE, AMOUNT_F, PREMIUM_F, COMMRATE_F, KINDCODE_Q, KINDNAME_Q, ITEMCODE_Q, ITEMNAME_Q, ITEMNATURE_Q, BUILDINGNO_Q, AMOUNT_Q, PREMIUM_Q, COMMRATE_Q, REMARK, IS_AUTO_RENEW, PREMIUM_T, EPOLICY, CLAUSE_SENDTYPE, ICREATE, DCREATE, IUPDATE, DUPDATE, TEMP_1, TEMP_2, TEMP_3, TEMP_4, TEMP_5, TEMP_6, TEMP_7, AMOUNT_F_LAST, AMOUNT_Q_LAST, PREMIUM_F_LAST, PREMIUM_Q_LAST, AMOUNT_F_AGT, AMOUNT_Q_AGT,
PREMIUM_F_AGT, PREMIUM_Q_AGT, TEMP_8,
RATE_F, ACCOUNTNO) values (#oid:DECIMAL#, #batchNo:VARCHAR#, #batchSeq:DECIMAL#, #isNew:VARCHAR#, #printvirtualcode:VARCHAR#, #policyno:VARCHAR#, #orderseq:VARCHAR#, #rationcode:VARCHAR#, #oldpolicyno:VARCHAR#, #handleridentifynumber:VARCHAR#, #handler1code:VARCHAR#, #comcode:VARCHAR#, #agentcode:VARCHAR#, #extracomcode:VARCHAR#, #extracomname:VARCHAR#, #businessnature:VARCHAR#, #channeltype:VARCHAR#, #projectcode:VARCHAR#, #introducerid:VARCHAR#, #startdate:TIMESTAMP#, #maildate:TIMESTAMP#, #updatedate:TIMESTAMP#, #serialno1:DECIMAL#, #mortgageepcode1:VARCHAR#, #sequenceno1:DECIMAL#, #creditnumber1:VARCHAR#, #collateralnumber1:VARCHAR#, #loansbehalfnumber1:VARCHAR#, #loanaccount1:VARCHAR#, #loansdepartment1:VARCHAR#, #serialno2:DECIMAL#, #mortgageepcode2:VARCHAR#, #sequenceno2:DECIMAL#, #creditnumber2:VARCHAR#, #collateralnumber2:VARCHAR#, #loansbehalfnumber2:VARCHAR#, #loanaccount2:VARCHAR#, #loansdepartment2:VARCHAR#, #addressno:DECIMAL#, #addresscode:VARCHAR#, #addressname:VARCHAR#, #addressdetailinfo:VARCHAR#, #repeatpolicyno:VARCHAR#, #possessnaturecode:VARCHAR#, #buildingno:DECIMAL#, #propAddressno:DECIMAL#, #wallmaterial:VARCHAR#, #roofmaterial:VARCHAR#, #structure:VARCHAR#, #structureText:VARCHAR#, #sumfloors:VARCHAR#, #buildarea:VARCHAR#, #buildyears:VARCHAR#, #kindcodeF:VARCHAR#, #kindnameF:VARCHAR#, #itemcodeF:VARCHAR#, #itemnameF:VARCHAR#, #itemnatureF:VARCHAR#, #buildingnoF:DECIMAL#, #highrisefee:DECIMAL#, #amountF:VARCHAR#, #premiumF:VARCHAR#, #commrateF:DECIMAL#, #kindcodeQ:VARCHAR#, #kindnameQ:VARCHAR#, #itemcodeQ:VARCHAR#, #itemnameQ:VARCHAR#, #itemnatureQ:VARCHAR#, #buildingnoQ:DECIMAL#, #amountQ:VARCHAR#, #premiumQ:VARCHAR#, #commrateQ:DECIMAL#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #isAutoRenew:VARCHAR#, #premiumT:VARCHAR#, #epolicy:VARCHAR#, #clauseSendtype:VARCHAR#, #icreate:VARCHAR#, #dcreate:TIMESTAMP#, #iupdate:VARCHAR#, #dupdate:TIMESTAMP#, #temp1:VARCHAR#, #temp2:VARCHAR#, #temp3:VARCHAR#, #temp4:VARCHAR#, #temp5:VARCHAR#, #temp6:VARCHAR#, #temp7:VARCHAR#, #amountFLast:DECIMAL#, #amountQLast:DECIMAL#, #premiumFLast:DECIMAL#, #premiumQLast:DECIMAL#, #amountFAgt:VARCHAR#,
#amountQAgt:VARCHAR#, #premiumFAgt:VARCHAR#, #premiumQAgt:VARCHAR#, #temp8:VARCHAR#,
#rateF:DECIMAL#, #accountno:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN
BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR#
BATCH_SEQ = #batchSeq:DECIMAL#
IS_NEW = #isNew:VARCHAR#
PRINTVIRTUALCODE = #printvirtualcode:VARCHAR#
POLICYNO = #policyno:VARCHAR#
ORDERSEQ = #orderseq:VARCHAR#
RATIONCODE = #rationcode:VARCHAR#
OLDPOLICYNO = #oldpolicyno:VARCHAR#
HANDLERIDENTIFYNUMBER = #handleridentifynumber:VARCHAR#
HANDLER1CODE = #handler1code:VARCHAR#
COMCODE = #comcode:VARCHAR#
AGENTCODE = #agentcode:VARCHAR#
EXTRACOMCODE = #extracomcode:VARCHAR#
EXTRACOMNAME = #extracomname:VARCHAR#
BUSINESSNATURE = #businessnature:VARCHAR#
CHANNELTYPE = #channeltype:VARCHAR#
PROJECTCODE = #projectcode:VARCHAR#
INTRODUCERID = #introducerid:VARCHAR#
STARTDATE = #startdate:TIMESTAMP#
MAILDATE = #maildate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATEDATE = #updatedate:TIMESTAMP#
SERIALNO_1 = #serialno1:DECIMAL#
MORTGAGEEPCODE_1 = #mortgageepcode1:VARCHAR#
SEQUENCENO_1 = #sequenceno1:DECIMAL#
CREDITNUMBER_1 = #creditnumber1:VARCHAR#
COLLATERALNUMBER_1 = #collateralnumber1:VARCHAR#
LOANSBEHALFNUMBER_1 = #loansbehalfnumber1:VARCHAR#
LOANACCOUNT_1 = #loanaccount1:VARCHAR#
LOANSDEPARTMENT_1 = #loansdepartment1:VARCHAR#
SERIALNO_2 = #serialno2:DECIMAL#
MORTGAGEEPCODE_2 = #mortgageepcode2:VARCHAR#
SEQUENCENO_2 = #sequenceno2:DECIMAL#
CREDITNUMBER_2 = #creditnumber2:VARCHAR#
COLLATERALNUMBER_2 = #collateralnumber2:VARCHAR#
LOANSBEHALFNUMBER_2 = #loansbehalfnumber2:VARCHAR#
LOANACCOUNT_2 = #loanaccount2:VARCHAR#
LOANSDEPARTMENT_2 = #loansdepartment2:VARCHAR#
ADDRESSNO = #addressno:DECIMAL#
ADDRESSCODE = #addresscode:VARCHAR#
ADDRESSNAME = #addressname:VARCHAR#
ADDRESSDETAILINFO = #addressdetailinfo:VARCHAR#
REPEATPOLICYNO = #repeatpolicyno:VARCHAR#
POSSESSNATURECODE = #possessnaturecode:VARCHAR#
BUILDINGNO = #buildingno:DECIMAL#
PROP_ADDRESSNO = #propAddressno:DECIMAL#
WALLMATERIAL = #wallmaterial:VARCHAR#
ROOFMATERIAL = #roofmaterial:VARCHAR#
STRUCTURE = #structure:VARCHAR#
STRUCTURE_TEXT = #structureText:VARCHAR#
SUMFLOORS = #sumfloors:VARCHAR#
BUILDAREA = #buildarea:VARCHAR#
BUILDYEARS = #buildyears:VARCHAR#
KINDCODE_F = #kindcodeF:VARCHAR#
KINDNAME_F = #kindnameF:VARCHAR#
ITEMCODE_F = #itemcodeF:VARCHAR#
ITEMNAME_F = #itemnameF:VARCHAR#
ITEMNATURE_F = #itemnatureF:VARCHAR#
BUILDINGNO_F = #buildingnoF:DECIMAL#
HIGHRISEFEE = #highrisefee:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_F = #amountF:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_F = #premiumF:VARCHAR#
COMMRATE_F = #commrateF:DECIMAL#
KINDCODE_Q = #kindcodeQ:VARCHAR#
KINDNAME_Q = #kindnameQ:VARCHAR#
ITEMCODE_Q = #itemcodeQ:VARCHAR#
ITEMNAME_Q = #itemnameQ:VARCHAR#
ITEMNATURE_Q = #itemnatureQ:VARCHAR#
BUILDINGNO_Q = #buildingnoQ:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_Q = #amountQ:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_Q = #premiumQ:VARCHAR#
COMMRATE_Q = #commrateQ:DECIMAL#
REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#
IS_AUTO_RENEW = #isAutoRenew:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_T = #premiumT:VARCHAR#
EPOLICY = #epolicy:VARCHAR#
CLAUSE_SENDTYPE = #clauseSendtype:VARCHAR#
ICREATE = #icreate:VARCHAR#
DCREATE = #dcreate:TIMESTAMP#
IUPDATE = #iupdate:VARCHAR#
DUPDATE = #dupdate:TIMESTAMP#
TEMP_1 = #temp1:VARCHAR#
TEMP_2 = #temp2:VARCHAR#
TEMP_3 = #temp3:VARCHAR#
TEMP_4 = #temp4:VARCHAR#
TEMP_5 = #temp5:VARCHAR#
TEMP_6 = #temp6:VARCHAR#
TEMP_7 = #temp7:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT_F_LAST = #amountFLast:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_Q_LAST = #amountQLast:DECIMAL#
PREMIUM_F_LAST = #premiumFLast:DECIMAL#
PREMIUM_Q_LAST = #premiumQLast:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_F_AGT = #amountFAgt:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT_Q_AGT = #amountQAgt:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_F_AGT = #premiumFAgt:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_Q_AGT = #premiumQAgt:VARCHAR#
TEMP_8 = #temp8:VARCHAR#
RATE_F = #rateF:DECIMAL#
ACCOUNTNO = #accountno:VARCHAR#
where BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# AND BATCH_SEQ = #batchSeq:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MA.TEMP_1, MA.ORDERSEQ, MA.OLDPOLICYNO, MA.IS_AUTO_RENEW, MA.STARTDATE, ADD_MONTHS(MA.STARTDATE, 12) AS ENDDATE, APPLY.IDENTIFYNUMBER AS ID_A, APPLY.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_A, INSURED.IDENTIFYNUMBER AS ID_I, INSURED.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_I, INSURED.POSTADDRESS AS POSTADDRESS_I, APPLY.POSTCODE AS POSTCODE_A, APPLY.POSTADDRESS AS POSTADDRESS_A, NVL(APPLY.PHONENUMBER, APPLY.MOBILE) AS PHONE_A, MA.EXTRACOMCODE, MA.TEMP_2, MA.LOANACCOUNT_1,MA.SUMFLOORS, MA.WALLMATERIAL, MA.ROOFMATERIAL, MA.BUILDAREA, MA.BUILDYEARS, MA.ADDRESSCODE, MA.ADDRESSDETAILINFO, MA.AMOUNT_F, MA.AMOUNT_Q, MA.PREMIUM_F, MA.PREMIUM_Q, NVL(INSURED.PHONENUMBER, INSURED.MOBILE) AS PHONE_I, APPLY.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTH_A,INSURED.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTH_I FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN MA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED APPLY WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='2' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# ) APPLY ON MA.BATCH_NO = APPLY.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = APPLY.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED INSURED WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='1' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# ) INSURED ON MA.BATCH_NO = APPLY.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = INSURED.BATCH_SEQ WHERE MA.BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# ORDER BY MA.BATCH_SEQ

SELECT MA.OLDPOLICYNO, APPLY.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_A, INS_NAME.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_I, APPLY.POSTCODE AS POSTCODE_A, APPLY.POSTADDRESS AS POSTADDRESS_A, MA.ADDRESSCODE, MA.ADDRESSDETAILINFO, MA.AMOUNT_F_LAST, MA.AMOUNT_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST + MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST AS PREMIUM_T_LAST, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE, 'YYY', 'NLS_CALENDAR= ''ROC OFFICIAL''') AS OLD_Y, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'MM') AS OLD_M, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'DD') AS OLD_D, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE, 'YYY', 'NLS_CALENDAR= ''ROC OFFICIAL''') ) +1 AS NEW_Y, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'MM') AS NEW_M, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'DD') AS NEW_D, MA.HANDLER1CODE, MA.HANDLERIDENTIFYNUMBER, PU.USERNAME, MA.AMOUNT_F, MA.AMOUNT_Q, MA.PREMIUM_F, MA.PREMIUM_Q, MA.PREMIUM_T, MA.IS_AUTO_RENEW, MA.BUSINESSNATURE, (SELECT SUBSTR(CODECNAME,0,6) FROM CCICDMS.PRPDNEWCODE WHERE CODETYPE='BusinessChannel' AND CODECODE = MA.BUSINESSNATURE) AS BUSINESSENAME FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN MA LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED APPLY WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='2' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR#) APPLY ON MA.BATCH_NO = APPLY.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = APPLY.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED INSURED WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='1' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR#) INSURED ON MA.BATCH_NO = INSURED.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = INSURED.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BATCH_SEQ,LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(INSUREDNAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY INSURED_SEQ) AS INSUREDNAME FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED WHERE BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# AND INSUREDFLAG='1' GROUP BY BATCH_SEQ ) INS_NAME ON INS_NAME.BATCH_SEQ = MA.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN PRPDUSER PU ON MA.HANDLER1CODE = PU.USERCODE WHERE MA.BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# AND TEMP_1 = '11'

SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACOMCODE, EXTRACOMNAME, IS_AUTO_RENEW FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN
BATCH_NO = #batchNo#
TEMP_1 = #temp1#

select MA.EXTRACOMCODE, MA.EXTRACOMNAME, MA.OLDPOLICYNO, MA.STARTDATE, ADD_MONTHS(MA.STARTDATE, 12) AS ENDDATE,APPLY.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_A, APPLY.IDENTIFYNUMBER AS ID_A, INSURED.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_I, INSURED.IDENTIFYNUMBER AS ID_I, MA.ADDRESSDETAILINFO, MA.AMOUNT_F_LAST, MA.AMOUNT_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST + MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST AS PREMIUM_T, MA.HANDLERIDENTIFYNUMBER, MA.IS_AUTO_RENEW from FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN MA left join (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='2' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR#) APPLY on MA.BATCH_NO = APPLY.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = APPLY.BATCH_SEQ left join (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='1' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR#) INSURED on MA.BATCH_NO = INSURED.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = INSURED.BATCH_SEQ where MA.BATCH_NO = #batchNo:VARCHAR# order by MA.BATCH_SEQ

SELECT MA.OLDPOLICYNO, APPLY.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_A, INS_NAME.INSUREDNAME AS NAME_I, APPLY.POSTCODE AS POSTCODE_A, APPLY.POSTADDRESS AS POSTADDRESS_A, MA.ADDRESSCODE, MA.ADDRESSDETAILINFO, MA.AMOUNT_F_LAST, MA.AMOUNT_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST, MA.PREMIUM_F_LAST + MA.PREMIUM_Q_LAST AS PREMIUM_T_LAST, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE, 'YYY', 'NLS_CALENDAR= ''ROC OFFICIAL''') AS OLD_Y, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'MM') AS OLD_M, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'DD') AS OLD_D, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE, 'YYY', 'NLS_CALENDAR= ''ROC OFFICIAL''') ) +1 AS NEW_Y, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'MM') AS NEW_M, TO_CHAR(MA.STARTDATE,'DD') AS NEW_D, MA.HANDLER1CODE,MA.HANDLERIDENTIFYNUMBER, pu.username, MA.AMOUNT_F, MA.AMOUNT_Q, MA.PREMIUM_F, MA.PREMIUM_Q, MA.PREMIUM_T, MA.IS_AUTO_RENEW, MA.BUSINESSNATURE, (SELECT SUBSTR(CODECNAME,0,6) FROM CCICDMS.PRPDNEWCODE WHERE CODETYPE='BusinessChannel' AND CODECODE = MA.BUSINESSNATURE) AS BUSINESSENAME FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN MA LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED APPLY WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='2' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo#) APPLY ON MA.BATCH_NO = APPLY.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = APPLY.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED INSURED WHERE INSUREDFLAG ='1' AND INSURED_SEQ = '1' AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo#) INSURED ON MA.BATCH_NO = INSURED.BATCH_NO AND MA.BATCH_SEQ = INSURED.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BATCH_SEQ,LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(INSUREDNAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY INSURED_SEQ) AS INSUREDNAME FROM FIR_AGT_TOCORE_INSURED WHERE BATCH_NO = #batchNo# AND INSUREDFLAG='1' GROUP BY BATCH_SEQ ) INS_NAME ON INS_NAME.BATCH_SEQ = MA.BATCH_SEQ LEFT JOIN PRPDUSER PU ON MA.HANDLER1CODE = PU.USERCODE WHERE MA.BATCH_NO = #batchNo#

SELECT BATCH_NO, PRPINS_BATCH_NO, COLLATERALNUMBER, POLICYNO, UBN, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, CURRENCY, AMOUNT_F, AMOUNT_Q, HOLDERIDS, INSUREDIDS, HOLDERNAMES, INSUREDNAMES, OLDPOLICYNO, LAST_PREMIUM, LAST_AMOUNT_F, LAST_AMOUNT_Q, SUMPREMIUM FROM FIR_AGT_YCB_FILE_PO po WHERE po.DATA_STATUS=1 AND po.BATCH_NO = #batchNo# ORDER BY po.OID

SELECT BATCH_NO, PRPINS_BATCH_NO, POLICYNO, TELPHONE, INSUREDID1, INSUREDNAME1, INSUREDNAME2, HOLDERID1, HOLDERNAME1, HOLDERNAME2, POSTCODE, POSTADDRESS, POSTCODE2, POSTADDRESS2, ADDRESSCODE, ADDRESSDETAILINFO, ADDRESSCODE2, ADDRESSDETAILINFO2, MORTGAGEEBANK1, MORTGAGEEBANK2, SUMAMOUNT, SUMPREMIUM, BUILDSTRUCTURE, BUILDAREA, BUILDYEARS, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, AMOUNT_F, PREMIUM_F, AMOUNT_Q, PREMIUM_Q, RATE, POSSESSNATURECODE, STRUCTURELEVEL, SIGNDATE, PAYMENTAREA, PAYMENTUNIT, PAYMENTRESP, HANDLEUSER, HANDLER1CODE, VIRTUALCODE, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5 FROM FIR_AGT_YCB_FILE_CO WHERE DATA_STATUS=1 AND BATCH_NO = #batchNo# ORDER BY OID

update FIR_AGT_TOCORE_MAIN

TEMP_4 = #temp4:VARCHAR#
TEMP_5 = #temp5:VARCHAR#
TEMP_6 = #temp6:VARCHAR#
TEMP_7 = #temp7:VARCHAR#

AMOUNT_Q_LAST = #amountQLast:DECIMAL#
PREMIUM_F_LAST = #premiumFLast:DECIMAL#
PREMIUM_Q_LAST = #premiumQLast:DECIMAL#

AMOUNT_Q_AGT = #amountQAgt:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_F_AGT = #premiumFAgt:VARCHAR#
PREMIUM_Q_AGT = #premiumQAgt:VARCHAR#
